TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that reduces pain. Celecoxib belongs to the family of drugs called nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory agents. It is being studied in the prevention of cancer.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que alivia el dolor. Celecoxib es un tipo de antiinflamatorio no esteroideo. Est치 estudi치ndose para la prevenci칩n del c치ncer.
